articles.title: Measles could once again become endemic in the US, the CDC warns - Ars Technica
articles.description: This year's measles cases are over 17x higher than cases seen in the first quarters of 2000 to 2023.

articles.title: Storage, infrastructure downplayed at Google Cloud Next '24 - TechTarget
articles.description: GenAI took center stage at Google Cloud Next, but a smattering of storage updates and an emphasis on AI workloads have some infrastructure experts curious about what's to come.
